content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Not bad for a late night snack! We ordered the spicy beef stew with dumplings, spicy pork and octopus and the donkatsu. The soup was a tad spicier than we could handle and the donkatsu sauce was a bit sweeter than we would have liked. But the spicy pork and octopus was great and highly recommend!
